review: This review is for those that intend to use it outside of USA. using NetflixBefore you buy it make sure that you have Netflix service in your country, you will not be able to use a DNS service.  Chromecast is locked to Google DNS service. There is a lot of information on the web about this problem, read before you spend your money.If you have Netflix Latin America the Chromecast will reproduce Latin America programming even if you use a DNS service with the intent of receiving USA programming.You can customize the Chromecast settings such as IP address and DNS, but the DNS will not take effect.
